items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. items.content_html: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the front end component to the application utilizing react and typescript to build a scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests
